column4: Hi, Is firefox 1.5 going to come to ubuntu repositories as an update or backport?
Thanks calamari, I have already 1.5 installed in my account (not system wide) as wiki suggests...

In breezy: sudo gparted -> segmentation fault . In hoary also gparted used to crash... Is the program buggy or is it something with my hw that causes the crash? Has anyone gparted working? Is there any alternative graphic partition manager program i could try?
try cfdisk (in terminal), not qui but more user friendly
